name: Fix My Hand Doc
description:
We believe that any of us had a situation when he fractured his hand or had a problem that needed to be cured.

Fix My Hand Doc is a simulator that teaches you how to proceed in various extreme situations. Your mission is to be a doctor who will have to treat the hands of different patients.

Don't worry, get over your emotions and everything will be fine. Just remember, don't rush! Good luck doc!

Game Features :
- Various cases with fractures or infections of the hand(use of ointment, patch, x-ray)
- Patients waiting for help
- Robot auto helper
